text: Catantopini is a tribe in the subfamily Catantopinae, a group of grasshoppers found in Africa, Asia and Australia.Orthoptera Species File: Catantopini ==Subtribes & Genera== The Orthoptera Species File lists the following (genera incomplete): * subtribe Apotropina Key, 1993 – Australia ** Apotropis Bolívar, 1906 ** Azelota Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 ** Burcatelia Sjöstedt, 1930 ** Clepsydria Sjöstedt, 1920 ** Epallia Sjöstedt, 1921 ** Fipurga Sjöstedt, 1921 ** Goniaeoidea Sjöstedt, 1920 ** Percassa Sjöstedt, 1921 ** Perunga Sjöstedt, 1921 ** Schayera Key, 1990 * subtribe Aretzina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Buforaniina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Catantopina Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 – Africa, Asia, Australia ** Catantops Schaum, 1853 ** Catantopsilus Ramme, 1929 ** Catantopsis Bolívar, 1912 ** Diabolocatantops Jago, 1984 ** Nisiocatantops Dirsh, 1953: N. orientalis (Kirby, 1888) ** Stenocatantops Dirsh, 1953 * subtribe Cirphulina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Coryphistina Mistshenko, 1952 – Australia Bark Mimicking Grasshopper, Coryphistes ruricola ** Coryphistes Charpentier, 1845 * subtribe Cratilopina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Ecphantina Key, 1993 – Malesia, Australia * subtribe Eumecistina Key, 1993 – Australia ** Asoramea Sjöstedt, 1921 ** Cervidia Stål, 1878 ** Erythropomala Sjöstedt, 1920 ** Eumecistes Brancsik, 1896 ** Euomopalon Sjöstedt, 1920 ** Genurellia Sjöstedt, 1931 ** Microphistes Sjöstedt, 1920 ** Pardillana Sjöstedt, 1920 ** Pespulia Sjöstedt, 1921 ** Retuspia Sjöstedt, 1921 * subtribe Goniaeina Key, 1993 – Australia ** Goniaea Stål, 1873 * subtribe Hepalicina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Loiteriina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Maclystriina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Macrazelotina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Macrotonina Key, 1993 – Australia Macrotona australis, female ** Macrotona Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 ** Theomolpus Bolívar, 1918 ** Xypechtia Sjöstedt, 1921 * subtribe Micreolina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Peakesiina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Perbelliina Key, 1993 – PNG, Australia, New Zealand * subtribe Pyrgophistina Key, 1993 - Australia * subtribe Russalpiina Key, 1993 – Tasmania, New Zealand * subtribe Stropina Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 - Australia * subtribe Urnisina Key, 1993 - Australia * not placed in a subtribe: ** Dimeracris Niu & Zheng, 1993 - China ** Phaeocatantops Dirsh, 1953 - Africa ** Stenocrobylus Gerstaecker, 1869 – Africa, India ** Trichocatantops Uvarov, 1953 - Africa ** Xenocatantops Dirsh, 1953 – Africa, India, China, Indo-China, Malesia, PNG ==Gallery== Spur-throated grasshopper (Catantops humeralis).jpg|Catantops humeralis Devil grasshopper (Diabolocatantops axillaris axillaris).jpg|Diabolocatantops axillaris axillaris Short-horned grasshopper (Xenocatantops humilis).jpg|Xenocatantops humilis Sabah, Borneo == References == == External links == * * Category:Acrididae Category:Orthoptera tribes Category:Taxa named by Carl Brunner von Wattenwyl
